65 class SolutionBase;
66 MOVEIT_CLASS_FORWARD(InterfaceState)
67 MOVEIT_CLASS_FORWARD(Interface)
68 typedef std::weak_ptr<Interface> InterfaceWeakPtr;
69 MOVEIT_CLASS_FORWARD(Stage)
70 MOVEIT_CLASS_FORWARD(Introspection)
71 
76 class InterfaceState
77 {
78  friend class SolutionBase; // addIncoming() / addOutgoing() should be called only by SolutionBase
79  friend class Interface; // allow Interface to set owner_ and priority_
80 public:
85  struct Priority : public std::pair<unsigned int, double>
86  {
87  Priority() : Priority(0, 0.0) {}
88  Priority(unsigned int depth, double cost) : std::pair<unsigned int, double>(depth, cost) {}
89 
90  inline unsigned int depth() const { return this->first; }
91  inline double cost() const { return this->second; }
92 
93  Priority operator+(const Priority& other) const {
94  return Priority(this->depth() + other.depth(), this->cost() + other.cost());
95  }
96  bool operator<(const Priority& other) const;
97  };
98  using Solutions = std::deque<SolutionBase*>;
99 
101  InterfaceState(const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& ps);
102  InterfaceState(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& ps);
103 
105  InterfaceState(const InterfaceState& other);
106 
107  inline const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& scene() const { return scene_; }
108  inline const Solutions& incomingTrajectories() const { return incoming_trajectories_; }
109  inline const Solutions& outgoingTrajectories() const { return outgoing_trajectories_; }
110 
111  PropertyMap& properties() { return properties_; }
112  const PropertyMap& properties() const { return properties_; }
113 
115  inline bool operator<(const InterfaceState& other) const { return this->priority_ < other.priority_; }
116  inline const Priority& priority() const { return priority_; }
117  Interface* owner() const { return owner_; }
118 
119 private:
120  // these methods should be only called by SolutionBase::set[Start|End]State()
121  inline void addIncoming(SolutionBase* t) { incoming_trajectories_.push_back(t); }
122  inline void addOutgoing(SolutionBase* t) { outgoing_trajectories_.push_back(t); }
123 
124 private:
125  planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr scene_;
126  PropertyMap properties_;
127  Solutions incoming_trajectories_;
128  Solutions outgoing_trajectories_;
129 
130  // members needed for priority scheduling in Interface list
131  Priority priority_;
132  Interface* owner_ = nullptr; // allow update of priority
133 };
134 
136 class Interface : public ordered<InterfaceState*>
137 {
138  using base_type = ordered<InterfaceState*>;
139 
140 public:
141  // iterators providing convinient access to stored InterfaceState
142  class iterator : public base_type::iterator
143  {
144  public:
145  iterator(base_type::iterator other) : base_type::iterator(other) {}
146 
147  InterfaceState& operator*() const noexcept { return *base_type::iterator::operator*(); }
148 
149  InterfaceState* operator->() const noexcept { return base_type::iterator::operator*(); }
150  };
151  class const_iterator : public base_type::const_iterator
152  {
153  public:
154  const_iterator(base_type::const_iterator other) : base_type::const_iterator(other) {}
155  const_iterator(base_type::iterator other) : base_type::const_iterator(other) {}
156 
157  const InterfaceState& operator*() const noexcept { return *base_type::const_iterator::operator*(); }
158 
159  const InterfaceState* operator->() const noexcept { return base_type::const_iterator::operator*(); }
160  };
161 
162  enum Direction
163  {
164  FORWARD,
165  BACKWARD,
166  START = FORWARD,
167  END = BACKWARD
168  };
169  using NotifyFunction = std::function<void(iterator, bool)>;
170  Interface(const NotifyFunction& notify = NotifyFunction());
171 
173  void add(InterfaceState& state);
174 
176  container_type remove(iterator it);
177 
179  void updatePriority(InterfaceState* state, const InterfaceState::Priority& priority);
180 
181 private:
182  const NotifyFunction notify_;
183 
184  // restrict access to some functions to ensure consistency
185  // (we need to set/unset InterfaceState::owner_)
186  using base_type::moveTo;
187  using base_type::moveFrom;
188  using base_type::insert;
189  using base_type::erase;
190  using base_type::remove_if;
191 };
192 
193 class StagePrivate;
195 class SolutionBase
196 {
197 public:
198  virtual ~SolutionBase() = default;
199 
200  inline const InterfaceState* start() const { return start_; }
201  inline const InterfaceState* end() const { return end_; }
202 
204  template <Interface::Direction dir>
205  inline const InterfaceState::Solutions& trajectories() const;
206 
207  inline void setStartState(const InterfaceState& state) {
208  // only allow setting once (by Stage)
209  assert(start_ == nullptr || start_ == &state);
210  start_ = &state;
211  const_cast<InterfaceState&>(state).addOutgoing(this);
212  }
213 
214  inline void setEndState(const InterfaceState& state) {
215  // only allow setting once (by Stage)
216  assert(end_ == nullptr || end_ == &state);
217  end_ = &state;
218  const_cast<InterfaceState&>(state).addIncoming(this);
219  }
220 
221  inline const StagePrivate* creator() const { return creator_; }
222  void setCreator(StagePrivate* creator);
223 
224  inline double cost() const { return cost_; }
225  void setCost(double cost);
226  void markAsFailure() { setCost(std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity()); }
227  inline bool isFailure() const { return !std::isfinite(cost_); }
228 
229  const std::string& comment() const { return comment_; }
230  void setComment(const std::string& comment) { comment_ = comment; }
231 
232  auto& markers() { return markers_; }
233  const auto& markers() const { return markers_; }
234 
236  virtual void fillMessage(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution& solution,
237  Introspection* introspection = nullptr) const = 0;
238  void fillInfo(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::SolutionInfo& info, Introspection* introspection = nullptr) const;
239 
241  bool operator<(const SolutionBase& other) const { return this->cost_ < other.cost_; }
242 
243 protected:
244  SolutionBase(StagePrivate* creator = nullptr, double cost = 0.0, std::string comment = "")
245  : creator_(creator), cost_(cost), comment_(std::move(comment)) {}
246 
247 private:
248  // back-pointer to creating stage, allows to access sub-solutions
249  StagePrivate* creator_;
250  // associated cost
251  double cost_;
252  // comment for this solution, e.g. explanation of failure
253  std::string comment_;
254  // markers for this solution, e.g. target frame or collision indicators
255  std::deque<visualization_msgs::Marker> markers_;
256 
257  // begin and end InterfaceState of this solution/trajectory
258  const InterfaceState* start_ = nullptr;
259  const InterfaceState* end_ = nullptr;
260 };
261 MOVEIT_CLASS_FORWARD(SolutionBase)
262 
263 class SubTrajectory : public SolutionBase
265 {
266 public:
267  SubTrajectory(
268  const robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryConstPtr& trajectory = robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryConstPtr(),
269  double cost = 0.0, std::string comment = "")
270  : SolutionBase(nullptr, cost, std::move(comment)), trajectory_(trajectory) {}
271 
272  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryConstPtr trajectory() const { return trajectory_; }
273  void setTrajectory(const robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr& t) { trajectory_ = t; }
274 
275  void fillMessage(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution& msg, Introspection* introspection = nullptr) const override;
276 
277 private:
278  // actual trajectory, might be empty
279  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryConstPtr trajectory_;
280 };
281 MOVEIT_CLASS_FORWARD(SubTrajectory)

288 class SolutionSequence : public SolutionBase
289 {
290 public:
291  using container_type = std::vector<const SolutionBase*>;
292 
293  explicit SolutionSequence() : SolutionBase() {}
294  SolutionSequence(container_type&& subsolutions, double cost = 0.0, StagePrivate* creator = nullptr)
295  : SolutionBase(creator, cost), subsolutions_(std::move(subsolutions)) {}
296 
297  void push_back(const SolutionBase& solution);
298 
300  void fillMessage(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution& msg, Introspection* introspection) const override;
301 
302  const container_type& solutions() const { return subsolutions_; }
303 
304  inline const InterfaceState* internalStart() const { return subsolutions_.front()->start(); }
305  inline const InterfaceState* internalEnd() const { return subsolutions_.back()->end(); }
306 
307 private:
309  container_type subsolutions_;
310 };
311 MOVEIT_CLASS_FORWARD(SolutionSequence)
312 
313 template <>
314 inline const InterfaceState::Solutions& SolutionBase::trajectories<Interface::FORWARD>() const {
315  return end_->outgoingTrajectories();
316 }
317 template <>
318 inline const InterfaceState::Solutions& SolutionBase::trajectories<Interface::BACKWARD>() const {
319  return start_->incomingTrajectories();
320 }
321 } // namespace task_constructor
322 } // namespace moveit

324 namespace std {
325 // comparison for pointers to SolutionBase: compare based on value
326 template <>
327 struct less<moveit::task_constructor::SolutionBase*>
328 {
329  bool operator()(const moveit::task_constructor::SolutionBase* x, const moveit::task_constructor::SolutionBase* y) {
330  return *x < *y;
331  }
332 };
